Vietnamese: Trình lưu trữ thông tin và báo cáo

English:
You can find an INFO HOARDER to sell reports you got from hacked satellites and console on any official trading station (and a few others).

Search for the Trader Cyborg nearby any of the following locations:
- Galactic Information Network (GIN) console
- Teleporters
- Main Trading  hub and related areas
- Main Entrance or Welcome areas

Check 'Missions & Activities: Hacking Consoles (Reports)' for more info!
Russian:
Вы можете найти Информационного брокера для продажи отчетов, полученных из взломанных спутников и консолей, на любой официальной торговой станции (и некоторых других).

Найдите киборга-торговца в любом из следующих мест:
- Консоль Галактической Информационной Сети (ГИС) 
- Телепорты
- Главный торговый центр и смежные области
- Главный вход или Зона приема гостей

Проверьте «Миссии и действия: Взлом консолей (отчеты)» для получения дополнительной информации!
Japanese:
ハッキングされた衛星やコンソールから入手したレポートを販売する「情報屋」は, 公式の取引ステーション(およびその他のいくつかのステーション)で見つけることができます. 

次のいずれかの場所の近くにあるトレーダーサイボーグを見つけてください. 
- 銀河情報ネットワーク(GIN)コンソール
- テレポーター
- メイントレーディングハブと関連エリア
- メインエントランスまたはウェルカムエリア

詳細については, 「ミッションとアクティビティ: コンソールのハッキング(レポート)」を確認してください.
Chinese (traditional):
你可以在任何交易站(和其他的)找到一個 訊息囤積者 來販賣你從駭進人造衛星跟控制台得到的報告.

在以下位置尋找一個商人機器人:
- 銀河訊息網絡 (GIN) 控制台
- 傳送器
- 主交易區 和 相關區域
- 主入口 或 迎賓區

Japanese: コンソールのハッキング(レポート)

English:
[u]Summary[/u]
- Some consoles, especially those in satellites, can be hacked to retrieve valuable reports.
- Those reports can be either sold at Info Hoarders or might be required for certain quests or missions.
- Satellites can be found floating around the sun in its warp-arrival area.
- Approach the satellite and access the console to hack it.

[u]How does Hacking work?[/u]
There are three ways to hack a (military, security, explorer, science or communication) report console:
1. With the appropriate clearance key (one-time-use)
2. By manual hacking (% success chance)
3. With a FIRE stick (% success chance / % losing stick on success / % losing stick on failure)

When your hacking was successful, you can always download at least 1 report. You can check for more reports at that point as well without having to hack the console again.

[u]Notes[/u]:
- Each console type has a limit on how many report-download attempts it will accept. Military consoles only allow 2, while Communication consoles allow for 10 downloads. 
- In case you downloaded the maximum amount of reports, the console will be locked and a CLEARANCE KEY is required to unlock it again.
- Failed hacking attempts will immediately lead to the console being LOCKED. A CLEARANCE KEY is required to unlock it again.
- Even when successfully hacking a device, each type of FIRE stick has an individual chance of being destroyed in the process. The chance to destroy the stick is doubled for failed hacking attempts. 
- CLEARANCE Keys are always consumed/destroyed on use.

Where to get those extra keys? (In-development note)
Currently FIRE STICKS ( 'Forced Information Release Executable' remote hacking device) and CLEARANCE KEYS are not yet available. They are planned to be available on certain places or from certain NPCs (missions). 

[c][ffffff]Check empyriononline.com for to follow the development![-][/c]
Japanese:
[u]概要[/u]
- 一部のコンソール, 特に衛星搭載のコンソールは, ハッキングされて貴重なレポートを取得できます. 
- これらのレポートは, 情報屋で販売されるか, 特定のクエストやミッションで必要になる場合があります. 
- 衛星はワープ到着エリアで太陽の周りに浮かんでいるのを見つけることができます. 
- 衛星に近づき, コンソールにアクセスしてハッキングします. 

[u]ハッキングはどのように機能しますか？[/u]
そこに(軍事, セキュリティ, 探検家, 科学, 通信)レポートコンソールをハッキングする3つの方法は次のとおりです. 
1. 適切なクリアランスキーを使用(1回限り)
2. 手動でハッキングする(成功率％)
 3. FIREスティックを使用(成功率%/成功時にスティックを失う%/失敗時にスティックを失う%)

ハッキングが成功した場合, 常に少なくとも1つのレポートをダウンロードできます. コンソールを再度ハックしなくても, その時点でさらに多くのレポートを確認できます. 

[u]注意事項[/u]: 
- 各コンソールタイプには, レポートのダウンロード受け入れの試行回数に制限があります. 軍用コンソールでは2回しか許可されていませんが, 通信コンソールでは10回のダウンロードが許可されています. 
- 最大量のレポートをダウンロードした場合, コンソールはロックされ, 再度ロックを解除するには「クリアランスキー」が必要です. 
- ハッキングの試みが失敗すると, すぐにコンソールがロックされます. 再度ロックを解除するには, 「クリアランスキー」が必要です. 
- デバイスのハッキングに成功した場合でも, 各タイプのFIREスティックはその過程で破壊される可能性があります. ハッキングの試みが失敗した場合, スティックを破壊する可能性は2倍になります. 
- クリアランスキーは使用時に常に消費/破棄されます. 

これらの追加のキーはどこで入手できますか？ (開発中のメモ)
現在, FIRE スティック('Forced Information Release Executable(強制情報リリース実行可能)'リモートハッキングデバイス)とクリアランスキーはまだ利用できません. それらは特定の場所または特定のNPC(ミッション)から利用できるように計画されています. 

[c][ffffff]empyriononline.comをチェックして, 開発をフォローしてください！[-][/c]
Chinese (traditional):
- 有些控制台, 尤其是在人造衛星的, 可以被駭入來取得有用的報告.


那些報告可以在訊息囤積者處賣掉或著在某些任務時會需要用到.



人造衛星可以在該星系恆星的曲速躍遷進入點的附近找到.



接近該衛星並使用它的控制台來駭入.

[u]要如何駭入?[/u]
有三種方法可以駭入(軍用, 警衛, 探索, 科學 或 通訊) 衛星控制台:
1.使用合適的通行證 (一次性)
2. 手動駭入(% 成功率)
3. 用駭客芯片 (% 成功率/ % 在成功時消耗芯片 / % 在失敗時消耗芯片)

當你成功駭入, 你每次至少可以下載一個報告. 你可以再確認是否還有更多報告可以下載而不用再次駭入.

[u]備註[/u]:
-每個控制台有其可以下載報告的最高上限. 軍事控制台只允許 2次, 通訊控制台允許 10次下載報告. 
- 要是你達到下載報告的上限, 控制台會被鎖住而需要 通行證 才可以將其解鎖.
-失敗的駭入會直接導致控制台鎖住. 需要 通行證才能再次解鎖.
- 就算成功駭入設備, 每個駭客芯片有個別機率會在過程中被消耗. 在失敗的駭入中被消耗機率是原本的兩倍. 
- 通行證 總是會被 使用/銷毀 當使用時.

去哪裡找到多的通行證呢? (在開發日誌上)
目前 駭客芯片 ( '強制訊息釋出執行' 遠端駭入設備) 和 通行證 還無法取得. 目前規劃是可以在特定地方 或 特定NPCs (任務)處取得. 

[c][ffffff]請上 empyriononline.com 來追蹤開發進度![-][/c]

Japanese: [c][ff0000][b]最初にお読みください: Empyriopedia[/b][-][/c]
見出しとPDA情報をクリックします

English: [c][ffff00]Click on the header of this chapter (10 Tips for GETTING STARTED) in the list on the LEFT to reveal the content of this chapter[-][/c] [c][ffff00]IF nothing is shown, make sure the button PDA INFO is highlighted in the TOP RIGHT![-][/c]
Russian: [c][ffff00]Щелкните заголовок этой главы (10 советов для НАЧАЛА РАБОТЫ) в списке СЛЕВА, чтобы открыть содержание этой главы.[-][/c] [c][ffff00]ЕСЛИ ничего не отображается, убедитесь, что кнопка КПК Инфо выделена В ВЕРХУ СПРАВА![-][/c]
Japanese: [c][ffff00]左側のリストにあるこの章のヘッダー(入門者の為の10のヒント)をクリックして, この章の内容を表示します[-][/c][c][ffff00]何も表示されない場合, ボタンPDA INFOが右上で強調表示されていることを確認してください！[-][/c]

English:
Unlike the JOURNEYBOOK (which tracks your progress in regards to STORY content), the [c][00ff2a]EMPYRIOPEDIA [-][/c]tracks your progress in regards to exploration and activities!

[u]CONTENT[/u]
The Empyriopedia offers several groups and chapters centered around tips and tricks about features and gameplay:
- STARTER INFO: 10 Tips for GETTING STARTED
- GAME MECHANICS Q&A (short summaries of game mechanics and features)
- GAME MECHANICS group (explains certain game mechanics in detail!)
- Missions & Activities (explains certain mission types and ingame activities)

The Empyriopedia also holds a wide range of encyclopedic entries for NPC, fauna, flora, factions, stars, planets and more! They often have more info and details about certain ingame assets!

[u]FUNCTIONS[/u]
- The game help & info chapters are always visible. 
- The encyclopedic entries will be made visible while you explore the galaxy or unless you do certain things.

Example: Some will be unlocked by just discovering their content (f.ex. planets, star classes etc). Others might be made visible, when you do certain things or play through certain missions.

You can even earn rewards for doing so. Check 'Missions and Activities' for more info!

[i]Note: the Empyriopedia currently does not hold ALL game assets (stations, vessels, etc) but will grow over time while new elements are added![/i]
Russian:
В отличие от ПУТЕВОДИТЕЛЯ (который отслеживает ваш прогресс в отношении содержания ИСТОРИИ) [c][00ff2a]ЭМПИРИОПЕДИЯ [-][/c]отслеживает ваши успехи в исследованиях и деятельности!

[u]СОДЕРЖАНИЕ[/u]
Эмпириопедия предлагает несколько групп и глав, посвященных советам и подсказкам, касающимся функций и игрового процесса:
- ИНФОРМАЦИЯ ДЛЯ НАЧИНАЮЩИХ: 10 советов для НАЧАЛА РАБОТЫ
- ИГРОВЫЕ МЕХАНИКИ В&О (краткое изложение игровой механики и функций)
- Группа ИГРОВЫЕ МЕХАНИКИ (подробно объясняет некоторые игровые механики!)
- Миссии & Мероприятия (объясняет некоторые типы миссий и игровые действия)

Эмпириопедия также содержит широкий спектр энциклопедических статей о NPC, фауне, флоре, фракциях, звездах, планетах и многом другом! В них часто есть дополнительная информация и подробности об определенных игровых активах!

[u]ФУНКЦИИ[/u]
- Разделы справки и информации по игре всегда видны. 
- Энциклопедические записи будут видны, пока вы исследуете галактику или пока вы не сделаете что-то определенное.

Пример: Некоторые будут разблокированы, просто обнаружив их содержимое (например, планеты, звездные классы и т.д.). Другие могут быть видны, когда вы выполняете определенные действия или проходите определенные миссии.

Вы даже можете получить за это вознаграждение. Проверьте «Миссии и мероприятия» для получения дополнительной информации!

[i]Примечание: в настоящее время Эмпириопедия не содержит ВСЕ игровые активы (станции, корабли и т. Д.), Но со временем она будет расти по мере добавления новых элементов![/i]
Japanese:
ジャーニーブック(ストーリーコンテンツに関する進捗状況を追跡する)とは異なり, [c][00ff2a]EMPYRIOPEDIA[-][/c]は, 探索とアクティビティに関する進捗状況を追跡します！

[u]コンテンツ[/u]
 Empyriopediaには, 機能とゲームプレイに関するヒントとコツを中心としたいくつかのグループと章があります. 
- スターター情報: 始めるための10のヒント
- ゲームの仕組みに関するQ＆A(ゲームの仕組みと機能の簡単な要約)
- ゲームメカニックスグループ(特定のゲームの仕組みについて詳しく説明しています！)
- ミッションとアクティビティ(特定のミッションの種類とゲーム内のアクティビティについて説明しています)

Empyriopediaには, NPC, 動物相, 植物相, 勢力, 星, 惑星などの幅広い百科事典のエントリもあります！ 多くの場合, 特定のゲーム内アセットに関する詳細情報があります！

[u]機能[/u]
- ゲームのヘルプと情報の章は常に表示されます. 
- 百科事典のエントリは, 銀河を探索している間, または特定のことを行わない限り表示されます. 

例: コンテンツ(惑星, スタークラスなど)を見つけるだけでロックが解除されるものもあります. 特定のことをしたり, 特定のミッションをプレイしたりすると, 他の人が見えるようになる場合があります. 

そうすることで報酬を獲得することもできます. 詳細については, 「ミッションとアクティビティ」を確認してください！

[i]注: Empyriopediaは現在, すべてのゲームアセット(ステーション, 船舶など)を保持しているわけではありませんが, 新しい要素が追加されると時間とともに成長します！[/i]
ホームシステム: 中心地区(Pol)

English: The home system of the Polaris Megacorp is the center of its industrial and logistics operations. Any ore freighter of the company and any vessels with valuable goods produced on the companies behalf in and outside of its territory will transport their precious load to this system eventually.
Russian: Домашняя система Полярис Мегакорп является центром ее промышленных и логистических операций. Любое грузовое судно компании и любые суда с ценными товарами, произведенными от имени компании на ее территории и за ее пределами, в конечном итоге доставят свой драгоценный груз в эту систему.
Japanese: ポラリスメガコープのホームシステムは, その産業およびロジスティクス業務の中心です. 会社の鉱石貨物船および会社の領土内外で会社のために生産された貴重品を積んだ船舶は, 最終的には貴重な荷物をこのシステムに輸送します.
ホームシステム: ポラリス本社惑星(Pol)

English: Residing on a lush alien world, the Polaris Company HQ and lots of its main logistic facilities have been built on that planet a long time ago. Any business runs from exactly this place. Every order to manage its incredible production capabilities of the company, down to any mine of the very edge of the territory originates from here.
Russian: Находясь в пышном инопланетном мире, штаб-квартира компании Полярис и множество ее основных логистических объектов были построены на этой планете давным-давно. Именно отсюда начинается любой бизнес. Отсюда берут начало каждый приказ по управлению своими невероятными производственными возможностями компании, вплоть до любой шахты на самом краю территории.
Japanese: 緑豊かな異星人の世界に住むポラリスカンパニー本社とその主要なロジスティック施設の多くは, はるか昔にその惑星に建設されました. どんなビジネスもまさにこの場所から運営されています. 領土の端にある鉱山に至るまで, 会社の信じられないほどの生産能力を管理するためのすべての注文は, ここから始まります.
ホームシステム: インダストリームーン(Pol)

English: The main industry facilities are build on the moon of the Polaris Megacorp home system - mostly due to highly unstable and toxic substances processed.
Russian: Основные промышленные объекты построены на луне домашней системы Полярис Мегакорп - в основном из-за перерабатываемых крайне нестабильных и токсичных веществ.
Japanese: 主な産業施設は, ポラリスメガコープのホームシステムの月に建てられています. これは主に, 非常に不安定で有毒な物質が処理されているためです.
ホームシステム: 中心地区(Tra)

English: Although the Traders Guild administration council cannot be compared to a company like Polaris Megacorp or the empire of the Zirax, its members have agreed to the necessity of having a central hub for speaking to each other, for congregations and some mutual planning of their wide spread activities. The guild central is situated in this solar system. You are friendly welcome .. in case you have something to trade.
Russian: Хотя административный совет Гильдии торговцев нельзя сравнивать с такой компанией, как Полярис Мегакорп или империи Зиракс, его члены согласились с необходимостью иметь центральный узел для общения друг с другом, для конгрегаций и некоторого взаимного планирования их широкого распространения видов деятельности. Центральная гильдия находится в этой солнечной системе. Добро пожаловать .. если есть чем торговать.
Japanese: トレーダーズギルド管理評議会は, ポラリスメガコープやジラックス帝国のような会社と比較することはできませんが, そのメンバーは, 会衆と彼らの広範な広がりのいくつかの相互計画のために, 互いに話すための中央ハブを持つ必要性に同意しました活動. ギルドセントラルはこの太陽系にあります. あなたは友好的な歓迎です..あなたが取引する何かを持っている場合に備えて.
ホームシステム: ギルドセントラル(Tra)

English: The Guild Central of the Traders Guild can be best compared to an open trading market, which is open to anyone interested in great offers and perfect trades.\n\nThe guild councils meeting places are only known by those that are part of the organization. Strangers are not welcome there.
Russian: Центральную гильдию Гильдии торговцев лучше всего сравнить с открытым торговым рынком, который открыт для всех, кто заинтересован в отличных предложениях и совершенных сделках.\n\nМеста собраний совета гильдии известны только тем, кто входит в организацию. Посторонним там не рады.
Japanese: トレーダーギルドの中央ギルドは, 素晴らしいオファーや完璧な取引に関心のある人なら誰でも参加できるオープンな取引市場と比較するのが最適です. \n\nギルド評議会の待ち合わせ場所は, 組織の一部である人だけが知っています. 見知らぬ人はそこに歓迎されていません.
ホームシステム: パイレーツギルド(Pir)

English:
Congratulations! 

You discovered the alledged position of the hidden [c][ffffff]Pirates Lair[-][/c] and earned an [c][ffffff]EXPLORER TOKEN[-][/c]. 
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
Read the Empyriopedia ([c][00ff11]F1[-][/c]) for more info.
Russian:
Поздравляем! 

Вы обнаружили предполагаемое местонахождение скрытого [c][ffffff]Пиратского логова[-][/c] и получили [c][ffffff]ЖЕТОН ИССЛЕДОВАТЕЛЯ[-][/c]. 
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
Прочтите Эмпириопедию ([c][00ff11]F1[-][/c]) для получения дополнительной информации.
Japanese:
おめでとう！

隠された[c][ffffff]パイレーツの隠れ家[-][/c]の位置を発見し, [c][ffffff]探査トークン[-][/c]を獲得しました. 
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
詳細については, Empyriopedia([c][00ff11]F1[-][/c])をお読みください.
ホームシステム: パイレーツレア(Pir)

English:
An Neutron Star, spreading death rays in all directions is not only hiding the 'Pirates Council'  but also several of the main bases of the leaders of the various pirate brotherhoods, called the 'Pirates Lair'.

The Pirates Lair is not comparable to any administrative location of other factions. It is merely a place where all the pirate chiefs try to earn the respect of the others and have a say in the annual meetings of the 'Pirates Council'.

Do not expect to be welcomed.
Russian:
Нейтронная звезда, распространяющая смертельные лучи во всех направлениях, скрывает не только «Совет пиратов», но и несколько основных баз лидеров различных пиратских братств, называемых «Пиратским логовом».

Пиратское логово не сравнимо с административным расположением других фракций. Это просто место, где все вожди пиратов пытаются заслужить уважение других и высказаться на ежегодных собраниях «Совета пиратов».

Не ждите, что вас будут приветствовать.
Japanese:
あらゆる方向に殺人光線を拡散する中性子星は, 「海賊評議会」だけでなく, 「パイレーツの隠れ家」と呼ばれるさまざまな海賊同胞団の指導者の主要な基地のいくつかを隠しています. 

海賊の隠れ家はそうではありません他の勢力の管理上の場所に匹敵します. ここは, すべての海賊首長が他の人の尊敬を集め, 「海賊評議会」の年次総会で発言権を獲得しようとする場所にすぎません. 

歓迎されることを期待しないでください.
ホームシステム: AIハブ(Tsc)

English: This is kind of the home system of the TESCH .. or what comes closest to its meaning for a race of AI machines.
Russian: Это своего рода домашняя система TESCH .. или то, что ближе всего к ее значению для расы машин ИИ.
Japanese: これは, テッシュのホームシステムの一種です. または, AI機械種族での意味に最も近いものです.
ホームシステム: サンクチュアリ(Tsc)

English: The 'home planet' of the TESCH might actually not be their birthplace. Ruins of an ancient civilization and strange black pillars cover the planetary surface. Peaking through its thick ice and snowy crust, they are telling stories of times long forgotten. The TESCH do not reside on that planet, but they consider it their 'sanctuary'.
Russian: «Родная планета» TESCH на самом деле может быть не местом их рождения. Руины древней цивилизации и странные черные столбы покрывают поверхность планеты. Проходя сквозь толстый лед и снежную корку, они рассказывают истории о давно забытых временах. TESCH не проживают на этой планете, но считают ее своим «святилищем».
Japanese: テッシュの「故郷の惑星」は実際には彼らの発祥の地ではないかもしれません. 古代文明の遺跡と奇妙な黒い柱が惑星の表面を覆っています. 厚い氷と雪に覆われた地殻をピークに, 彼らは長い間忘れられていた時代の物語を語っています. テッシュはその惑星に住んでいませんが, 彼らはそれを彼らの「聖域」と考えています.

English:
The Brotherhoods mission statement is to bring peace to the galaxy through prosperity as Farr did on Parthix. Using their great wealth they will provide food, shelter and medical treatment to those that need it throughout the stars.

Every member is a Brother, Women included. There are 4 ranks within the Brotherhood with several layers of seniority within those.
- Initiate, a recruit of the brotherhood, learning the ways but not ready to teach.
- Brother, the main rank of the Brotherhood, promoting equality and teaching the lessons of Farr
- Elder, when conflicts arise, Elder Brothers are called upon to resolve and provide wisdom to the younger.
- Eldest, only one can be the eldest, he or she is a spiritual leader and will interpret the teachings of Farr, they will also maintain that which Farr left us.
Russian:
Миссия Братства - принести мир в галактику через процветание, как это сделал Farr на Parthix. Используя свое огромное богатство, они будут обеспечивать едой, кровом и лечением тех, кто в этом нуждается, по всему миру.


Каждый член - Брат, в том числе и женщины. В Братстве 4 ранга с несколькими уровнями старшинства.
- Посвященный, новобранец братства, изучающий пути, но не готовый учить.
- Брат, главный чин Братства, пропагандирующий равенство и преподающий уроки Farr.
- Старшие, когда возникают конфликты, Старшие братья призваны разрешить и дать мудрость младшим.
- Старейшина, только один может быть старейшиной, он или она является духовным лидером и будет интерпретировать учение Farr, они также будут поддерживать то, что Farr оставил нам.
Japanese:
同胞団の使命は, ファーがパルティックスで行ったように, 繁栄を通じて銀河に平和をもたらすことです. 彼らの莫大な富を利用して, 星の至る所でそれを必要とする人々に食糧, 避難所, 医療を提供します. 

すべてのメンバーは兄弟であり, 女性も含まれます. 同胞団には4つのランクがあり, その中にはいくつかの年功序列があります. 
- 同胞団の新兵であるイニシエートは, 方法を学びますが, 教える準備はできていません. 
- 同胞団のメインランクであり, 平等を促進し, ファーのレッスンを教える
- 長老, 対立が生じたとき, 兄は解決し, 若い人に知恵を提供するように求められます. 
- 長男, 長男になることができるのは1人だけで, 彼または彼女は精神的な指導者であり, ファーの教えを解釈します. 彼らはファーが私たちに残したものも維持します.

English: The ARC company is producting any kind of high tech utilities.
Russian: Компания ARC производит любые виды высокотехнологичного оборудования.
Japanese: ARC社はあらゆる種類のハイテクユーティリティを製造しています.
ウェイストランダーズ(WST)
ウェイストランダーズ(WST)

English: The Wastelanders are a group of scavengers.
Japanese: ウェイストランダーズ(WST)はスカベンジャーのグループです.

English: The Home System of the Brotherhood of Farr.
Italiano: Sistema Natale della Fratellanza di Farr.
Japanese: ホームシステム: ファー同胞団(BoF).

English:
Congratulations!

English:
Author: Vera Lebedev

Vera Lebedev graduated with a Master’s Degree in Biological Research from University Nebo Kozlov in 2467 and has gone on to be one of the most prolific deep space biology experts in Andromeda. She has published all fifteen of her books from her home station, Norilsk. Her works are an extensive compilation of her own discoveries, numerous explorer reports and other scientific theorems.

Source: Vera Lebedev, Personal Biological Findings, published 2471

[c][ffffff]This chapter of the Empyriopedia contains information on all biological topics such as plants, half plants, anything that can be grown or harvested (plants or crystals), creatures that do not belong to one of the NPC factions, and related topics.[-][/c]

Note: Information on equipment needed for farming or growing crops can be found in the [c][ffffff]Crafters Manual[-][/c] section!  

[i]Expand and reveal the info of the chapter categories and their sub-folders by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Deutsch:
Autorin: Vera Lebedew

Vera Lebedew schloss 2467 ihr Studium der biologischen Forschung an der Universität Nebo Kozlov mit einem Master ab und ist seitdem eine der gefragtesten Experten für Weltraumbiologie in Andromeda. Sie hat alle fünfzehn ihrer Bücher von ihrer Heimatstation Norilsk aus veröffentlicht. Ihre Werke sind eine umfangreiche Zusammenstellung ihrer eigenen Entdeckungen, zahlreicher Entdeckerberichte und anderer wissenschaftlicher Theoreme.

Quelle: Vera Lebedew, Persönliche biologische Entdeckungen, veröffentlicht 2471

[c][ffffff]Dieses Kapitel der Empyriopedia enthält Informationen zu allen biologischen Themen wie Pflanzen, Halbpflanzen, alles, was angebaut oder geerntet werden kann (Pflanzen oder Kristalle), Kreaturen, die nicht zu einer der NSC-Fraktionen gehören, und verwandte Themen. [-][/c]

Hinweis: Informationen zur Ausrüstung, die du für die Landwirtschaft oder den Anbau von Pflanzen benötigst, findest du im [c][ffffff]Handbuch für Handwerker[-][/c]!  

[i]Erweitere und öffne die Informationen der Kapitelkategorien und ihrer Unterordner, indem du [c][80ffff]auf die Überschrift[-][/c] und/oder auf die [c][80ffff]Pfeil-Schaltflächen [-][/c]daneben klickst.[/i]

English: This chapter of the Empyriopedia contains information on the use and production of items, devices and equipment, as well as on the available resources and related topics.\n\n[i]Expand and reveal the info of the chapter categories and their sub-folders by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Deutsch: Dieses Kapitel der Empyriopedia enthält Informationen über die Verwendung und Herstellung von Gegenständen, Geräten und Ausrüstungen sowie über die verfügbaren Ressourcen und verwandte Themen.\n\n[i]Erweitere und zeige die Informationen der Kapitelkategorien und ihrer Unterordner an, indem du [c][80ffff]auf ihre Überschrift[-][/c] und/oder auf die [c][80ffff]Pfeilschaltflächen [-][/c]daneben klickst.[/i]

English: Available in nearly any location, either intentionally or as a byproduct from drilling and mining.
Deutsch: An fast jedem Ort verfügbar, entweder absichtlich oder als Nebenprodukt von Bohrungen und Bergbau.

English: Can be produced with a portable O2 generator (small bottles) or produced in a constructor (large bottles)
Deutsch: Kann mit einem tragbaren O2-Generator (kleine Flaschen) oder in einem Konstruktor (große Flaschen) hergestellt werden

English: Can be produced with a water generator or melted from ice.
Deutsch: Kann mit einem Wassergenerator hergestellt oder aus Eis geschmolzen werden.

English: This area of the Empyriopedia contains information medical, fauna, flora and other topics!\n\n[i]Expand and reveal the info of the chapter categories and their sub-folders by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Deutsch: Dieser Bereich der Empyriopedia enthält Informationen zu Medizin, Fauna, Flora und anderen Themen![i]\n\n[i]Erweitere und zeige die Informationen der Kapitelkategorien und ihrer Unterordner an, indem du [c][80ffff]auf ihre Überschrift[-][/c] und/oder auf die [c][80ffff]Pfeilschaltflächen [-][/c]daneben klickst.[/i]

English:
Ailment Specifics: 
After skin contact with a host creature, which is just about lifeform, the microscopic organisms quickly burrow into the skin. Once there, they quickly tunnel through muscle tissue, vital organs, and the central nervous system. They act as terraforming invaders. Their goal is to convert flesh into a better living environment. At first survivors reported feeling stronger, faster, and more robust. Within minutes they described an intense hunger and symptoms of heavy radiation. It was at this stage the feelings of unknown terror set in.
Roughly half the patients die at this phase. They are the lucky ones. The other half become terrible malformed abominations that seek to spread their offspring to the universe.

Other Notes: 
This is one of the most horrific diseases known to science. Reports from my colleagues state that these parasites are responsible for many facility abandonments in numerous galaxies. Some regions of this galaxy can be considered dangerous hotspots. Use abundant caution.

Additional Information:
- Often caused by [c][ffffff]Combat Injuries[-][/c]
- Not treating it will end in death or worse.
- Has side effect of getting you  [c][ffffff]Fever Attacks[-][/c].
- Increases health rebuild, movement speed, stamina recovery speed and food consumption rate

Treatments: 
Decontamination kit, anti-parasite injection, a detox kit, or treatment at advanced medical stations (type 4).  

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: April 15th 2472[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Psychedelic Alteration, more commonly known as a “Bad Trip”, is no state that any knowledgeable space traveler wants to find themselves in. In most cases, a feeling of queasiness accompanies visual distortions. Patients have also commonly reported fatigue and hunger. These symptoms are deadly in a hostile environment, but there are some other rare symptoms. These include audio or visual hallucinations and paranoia. Most notably the sensation of being watched or sharing your mind with some unknown entity.
Causes: Eating foreign uncooked food or drink, over ingesting natural stimulants and energy pills. Lastly, drinking too much berry wine, as this doctor personally learned.

Other Notes: 
Some patients report euphoria with their “trips”. After this, they actively sought them out. They did not survive prolonged repeated exposures nor did they return from their expeditions.

Additional Information:
- Eating foreign uncooked drink or food (f.ex. mushrooms!), over ingesting natural stimulants and energy pills. Lastly, drinking too much berry wine, as this doctor personally learned.
- Untreated cases will become hangovers.
- Reduces stamina recovery speed and movement speed
- Increases food consumption rate

Treatments: 
Bed rest, warm milk, hot beverages, bowel evacuation, a first aid kit, and antitoxic pills or injections, a detox kit, and fire moss scrapings will suffice. Sleeping helps as well.

Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: January 19th 2470

Most alien teeth are affixed to their owners and require some force to remove. They are namely used for defense, if the creature is prey, or attack if it is a predator. They should be handled with care as residual fluids on it can lead to envenomation in some species.

While they come in a variety of wondrous shapes and sizes, nearly all can be synthesized for detoxification medicines. The resulting drug can assist not only with poisons or contaminants from the host creature, but with other sources of toxic build up as well.

The biggest trouble is getting their owners to relinquish them. However, I don’t blame them for being reluctant to part with their dental anatomy.

Source: Vera Lebedev, Astrological Biology, published 2472

The humble Alien Thorn is one of the most useful plant products in the galaxy. It can be found on a number of prickly vegetation throughout explored and unexplored space. It does come in a variety of lovely colors, but the most common, and identifiable, is the green base with the orange or red spike.

It can be created using the food processor as well. However, it is much more energy and time efficient to simply harvest them when encountered.

Few appreciate these Sclerenchyma structures until they find themselves injured. Their cellular make up causes them to be a vital component in Health Packs and First Aid Kits. Their chemical compounds help assist with rapid tissue regeneration. Don’t say that plants never did anything for you after getting medical attention.

Source: Vera Lebedev, Astrological Biology, published 2472

Another beneficial substance from florae is Alien Plasma T6. It is a sticky sap and is gray in color. This substance is the lifeblood of the plant itself and is antiseptic in nature. Several species are already known to secrete it. Those include, but are not limited to: some pod plants, certain coral species, and cacti species.

Harvesting is simple enough, just scrape the dermal layer of the subject and collect the ooze which comes out. It will have a slightly sweet smell if you’ve selected it correctly.

The sap is a vital part of health pack and decontamination kit creation. If you ever run low, the material can be manufactured at a food processor. You’ll need a protein base, some cellulose, and Alien Plasma ZR1. When in a patch of foliage that produces Alien Plasma T6, I suggest you take as much as you can. You don’t know when you’ll bump into it again and it doesn’t harm the plant any.

Source: Vera Lebedev, Interstellar Biological Discoveries, published 2470

In most cases Alien Plasma ZR1 can be collected from water based plants. They are namely coral or reefs. While it can be found from other plant varieties, it can also be created with natural compounds at a processor.

In its natural form it is a light and flakey algae ridge which blooms on the vegetation’s stalk. It comes in a rainbow of flashy colors, but its most common form is that of a pinkish-red.

Medically, it has antiseptic properties and is used for health pack manufacturing or detoxification curatives.

I must admit that I have preserved several specimens and kept them on display. They are a great decoration and conversation starter. 

Source: Vera Lebedev, The Botanical Colors of Andromeda, published 2471

Alien parts are exactly what they sound to be, parts from alien creatures. I could write volumes on these different parts from different species. Maybe I will one day.

What we do know is that utilizing the amino acids and calcium from these structures is of great medical benefit. Of course, most animals are not willing to simply remove their appendages on your behalf. So it is advised to harvest the parts whenever you must slay a creature. Otherwise, they can be replicated at a workstation.

The calcium and amino acids are processed to transfer the resistances of the former creature. As such they are very effective at fending off parasites that other native species have adapted to. They are a vital component to the creation of Alien Plasma ZR1 and thus have many more flexible applications. 

Source: Vera Lebedev, Andromeda’s Biology, published 2470

One of my favorite topics are the many varieties of berries in Andromeda. They are all relatives of each other and that is proof of their hardiness across the systems. Individual flowers form clusters on the plant which blooms throughout seasons and any climate. No wonder they spread so well!

Once fruited, their flower clusters form berry clusters, much like grapes from the Sol System and just as edible. They can range from green, white, black, red, yellow, and the most common deep blue color. The flesh is soft and each berry has a pit which reproduces when allowed to propagate.

These berries make great juices, cake fillings, and even some delicious wines. Each planet, or ecology on that planet, will have a different flavor. It makes them a wonderful treasure wherever they are found.

Source: Vera Lebedev, Eating Andromeda, published 2468

The easily overlooked buds are a resource that you’ll want in your kitchen. Several different species of plant produce buds. One is a large leafy green shrub. The other is a big blue flower with massive stamens and pistils. As hermaphroditic plants, they reproduce quickly and are found throughout the systems.

To harvest the buds, simply scrape off the green nodules on the ends of their new growth. Some will feel smooth and others are very coarse.

These rough outgrowths are adapted to resist the elements trying to stifle them. Their internal chemistry generates self-sustaining heat. Mix them into a Too Hot beverage and you’ll find them warming your body in any climate. A Too Hot beverage is also a great addition to any emergency ration.

Source: Vera Lebedev, Eating Andromeda, published 2468

Ailment Specifics:

Ailment Specifics: 
This is the luckiest kind of break you can suffer. Compared to a compound, or open fracture – this is a cakewalk. Instead of bleeding and a heightened risk of infection, you’ll deal with swelling and bruising. While painful, the fatigue and reduced movement are a danger. These are agonizing enough for most personnel to not repeat the experience.

Other Notes: 
These are all too common. Most are related to sticking limbs where they shouldn’t be. Whether it’s in between moving mechanical parts, under loose rocks, over cliff edges. or an aggressive creature’s mouth.

Additional Information:
- Causes by strikes from hostile beings, falls, carrying too much, and collisions with objects at high speeds o when healing an [c][ffffff]Open Fracture.[-][/c]
- If neglected, these can aggravate into necrosis
- Reduces movement speed, maximum health and stamina recovery speed.

Treatments: 
Bandages will usually help, but first aid kits and treatment at a conventional medical station (type 3) is preferred. 

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: December 1sth 2468[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
These burns can range from first degree to third degree. They are painful and a source for infection. Covering them up is your first priority. Moving around with them in the open air is very painful and restricts movement.

Other Notes: 
Dermal burns are fortunately treatable without major scars. In the past, they would leave dreadful dead tissue behind and disfigure the patient.

Additional Information:
- Caused by combat injuries, but also by coming into contact with hot machinery, being exposed to intense sunrays or radiation. Open flames can cause this injury.
- Without treatment, these easily become [c][ffffff]infected wounds[-][/c].
- Will drain health and reduce walking speed

Treatments: 
The best options are antibiotic ointments, first aid kits, mobile (HV,SV) or stationary (BA,CV) medical stations (type 2). Lesser ideal, but helping options are bandages and applying herbal leaves, aloe vera, fire moss scrapings or natural sweeteners.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: August 28th 2471[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
The dermal parasite is a sinister evolutionary combination of scabies and roundworms. It makes them very easy to spread and move through the dermal layers. They seem to act cohesively in their infestation. Treat them immediately or they will inhabit deeper tissue layers quickly.

Other Notes: 
Treating the dermal parasites will often leave an [c][ffffff]open wound[-][/c] in their wake. Ensure that you are ready to treat that as well or you could risk reinfection.

Additional Information:
- Caused by direct skin contact with parasite carrying creatures or surfaces in the surrounding environment. 
- Reduces stamina recovery speed, drains health and reduces max health

Treatments: 
Antitoxin ointments, Antibiotic Pills and Injections are effective at this stage of infection. Stronger alternatives are detox- and decontamination kits, anti-parasite pills and -injections. Medical stations (type 1 or 4) are also advised.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: March 26th 2472 [/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Once the dermal layers are penetrated, the hypodermis skin layers are infected by the parasite. Pain at the pest-ridden site is common. A hunger will start to develop. Get medical help immediately.

Other Notes: 
Few patients forgo ailment management at this stage. It becomes readily apparent, and excruciating enough, to realize that the skin is affected by something more than a rash. The outlook is dire for any who don’t seek help or think they can treat the infestation themselves.

Additional Information:
- Caused by (combat) injuries from infected life forms. 
- Increases food consumption rate
- Do not neglect this condition farther or it will continue to grow into a mature to a [c][ffffff]stage 2[-][/c] Endoparasite infestation.

Treatments: 
At this stage ointments are no longer an option. Use anti-parasite or antibiotic pills or injections. Decontamination and detox kits are effective as well as medical stations (type 4).

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: April 7th 2472[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Once the parasites become comfortable in hypodermis skin layer, they start to nest in hair follicles and sweat glands where they reproduce quickly. Pain intensifies, hunger increases, fatigue sets in, and pus will form. Quickly see a doctor.

Other Notes: 
The fatigue, pain, and pus can sometimes be mistaken for an infected wound. Any doctor worth their salt should investigate the injury with standardized telescoping microscopic lenses. The infestation should be immediately noticeable.

Additional Information
- Caused by not treating stage 1 Endoparasites 
- Stage 2 Endoparasites will progress them to a stage 3 condition which is followed by adult Endoparasite colonies.
- Reduces stamina recovery speed and increases food consumption

Treatments: 
Now the parasites have expanded their habitat farther in your body. Not all previous treatments are effective, but Antibiotic Pills can still help to mitigate the immediate effects. Use Antibiotic injections, anti-parasite pills or injections, a detox kit, a decontamination kit, or get to a medical station (type 4) to fully heal the affliction.

Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: August 1st 2471

Ailment Specifics: 
It is at this time that the parasites become visible to the naked eye due to them getting nutrients from the fat layer behind your skin. They appear as pale yellow three to six inch worms that slither under your epidermis. Internal bleeding will occur alongside the symptoms from stage two.

Other Notes: 
Most survivors of this stage will suffer permanent hair loss from the damage to their skin. This can also be accompanied by baggy flesh if the infestation has progressed enough.

Additional Information
- Caused by untreated stage 2 Endoparasites
- If left untreated, the colonies will grow and result in death as you are literally eaten from inside out. Their hunger knows no bounds.
- Stage 3 Endoparasites will also temporarily incapacitate you
- Reduces statmina recovery speed and health while increasing food consumption

Treatments: 
The final of the infestation is here. Only detox kits, decontamination kits, anti-parasite injections, and medical stations (type 4) are your last hope. You can mitigate the immediate effects with Antibiotic Injection, though.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: October 15th 2469[/i]

Can be cured by:

Will remove:

Ailment Specifics:

Ailment Specifics: 
Fever attacks are a reaction when your body is trying to burn out an infection or fight introduced foreign bodies. A feeling of hot skin is reported by most patients. The forehead and back are most notable. Sweat is profuse and weakness permeates muscles while lack of energy will be noticeable.

Other Notes: 
Please seek medical treatment once you sense something is wrong and before it develops into a fever attack. Don’t wait, or you’ll need a coroner, and not a doctor. These attacks are very life threatening and should be attended to immediately. Failure to do so will surely end in death.

Additional Information
- Causesd mostly by untreated conditions or infectious contaminants that enter the body. Prime examples are sepsis and parasites. Can also be caused when ignoring an Heat Stroke.
- Will result in an Hangover when not cured.
- Reduces health and stamina recovery speed.

Treatments: 
Can be mitigated by Painkillers. A better solution is a medical station (type 1 or 4), or a first aid kit. 

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: September 26th 2466[/i]

Ailment Specifics:
Ah, the time tested food poisoning. This condition is as old as humanity. It never ceases to amaze me how many people, despite knowing better, still pick up stuff they find on the ground and stick it in their mouths. There is no excuse to try and eat unprocessed or rotten food.

Additional Information:
- Caused by eating raw food (meat, berries, mushrooms,...) and also  (but by a low chance) by overusing medical items
- Results in an [c][ffffff]Intoxication [-][/c]when not cured.
- Increases food consumption.

Treatments:
To treat this ailment, grab some Painkillers. They work quickly and are usually readily available to boost your immune response. Otherwise, first aid kits will have treatments inside them. Medical stations both mobile and stationary (type 1) should be able to assist too.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: July 12th 2468[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
At this stage of coldness, some serious complications arise. The body will try and heat itself which in turn causes desperate hunger. The shakes will cause slower movement and fatigue readily sets in.

Other Notes: 
This is a sneaky one and can quickly overtake you. Many asteroid miners have suffered permanent damage when they thought they could tough out the cold just a little longer. That hunk of ore is not worth your life.

Additional Information:
- Caused by staying in cold environments (In-suit temperature <5°) for a long period of time.
- Will cause Frostbite and Stunned when not cured.
- Reduces health, stamina recovery speed and movement speed

Treatments: 
Increase body temperature as soon as possible. Getting into a powered base or vessel is most advised. Once there, either get a hot shower, into a warm bed, or drink a hot beverage, if you have one with you. There are Portable Heater/Coolers (terrain placeable) these days. So get near one if all of those options are inaccessible.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: June 1st 2471[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
I’d highly recommend avoiding frostbite at all costs. Not only is it painful, but the discolored tissue damage can lead to necrosis. If left untreated, this condition will lead to death or permanent loss of digits. Patients report a persistent feeling of coldness, pins and needles, as well as numbness. No, the loss of these do not make for a neat party story.

Other Notes: 
Frostbite can set in during space walks. Being that this is the most common source, ensure to install warmth modifications into your suits.

Additional Information:
- Caused by ignoring the cold and not warming your body adequately. Especially if already Freezing.
- Cuases [c][ffffff]Necrosis[-][/c] if not treated.
- Reduces health and movement speed.

Treatments: 
You will want to apply Antibiotic ointment, components from a first aid kit, or get to a mobile or stationary medical station (type 2) as soon as possible. Barring those, raw Fire Moss scrapings will help. Otherwise, some Painkillers or taking a hot shower and sleeping help boost the immune system until your in-suit temperature rises above 18° again. Getting close to a Portable Heater/Cooler (terrain placeable device) helps as well.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: February 5th 2472[/i]

Ailment Specifics:
The very common hangover is something that most personnel are already experienced with. Sensations of sluggishness, headaches, and nausea will assault you. This is a huge disadvantage being in a survival situation, so monitor your consumptions.

Other Notes:
Any person who has attended, or graduated medical school, is very familiar with this condition. As such, be prepared for partying or long study hours if you plan to attend medical school.

Additional Information:
- Caused by too many alcoholic beverages, overuse of energy pills, and not treating some conditions, like Bad Trip and Fever Attack sufficiently.
- Reduces stamina recovering speed and movement speed.

Treatments: 
There are several methods to amending a hangover: sleeping it off, making a bowel movement, using Painkillers, or medicine from a first aid kit, drinking purified water, a hot beverage, and vegetable or fruit juices.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: November 15th 2468[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
At this stage of heat, well past heat stroke, your body can’t cool itself. Seizures can begin and death is close. Suffers have said they feel like they are aflame. Confusion may set in and a loss of consciousness will transform you into a cadaver. 

Other Notes: 
Most heat collapses are seen in the engineering and mechanical fields. Professionals often spend much of their time in engine rooms or by reactors that can emit dangerous levels of heat. I advise working in pairs and hydrating before, during, and after a shift.

Additional Information:
- Caused by in-suit temperatures >55° while remaining in a hot environment or near a heat source for prolonged periods.
- Reduces health and slows down stamina recovering speed.

Treatments: 
Quickly enter a powered vessel, or environmentally controlled base, or ingest a food item that will lower your body temperature. Portable Heater/Cooler (terrain placeable device), sleeping or taking a shower will assist. Hydration is a must.


[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: January 21st 2469[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
A heat stroke is the predecessor to a heat collapse. At this time, the condition is much less life threatening. It will quickly lead to fatigue and rapid sweating. While not a healthy state to be in, it is normally not life threatening if you take action to lower your body temperature. Failing to do such will lead to death or a heat collapse. A fever attack can follow if it is not treated in time.

Other Notes: 
Heat strokes are normally encountered on very hot planets, near some high radiation zones, or can be induced by using heat generating equipment for long periods.

Additional Information:
- Caused by in-suit temperatures >45° while staying too close to heat sources or not getting out of hot locations. Take breaks from these situations.
- Leads to [c][ffffff]Fever Attack[-][/c] when ignored
- Reduces health and slows down stamina recovering speed.

Treatments: 
Immediately relocate away from any heat sources. Get inside of a powered vessel or base, or stand by a Portable Heater/Cooler (terrain placeable device). Drinking cool – not ice cold – water, milk, juices, or eating cool fruit or meals will help. Hopping into a cool shower, or getting into a bed can be of assistance.



[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: July 22nd 2470[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Hypothermia will quickly drain your stamina and make it difficult to get around. At this stage of freezing, patients often get the shakes, shivers, their teeth chatter, and their skin starts to discolor. Treatment needs to be within moments or this will stun the patient and develop into true freezing to death.

Other Notes: 
Many survivors that are rescued in known space can come down with this condition. Half an hour in an unpowered vessel can be very uncomfortable. However, if someone is in uncharted space when their ship loses power, most are simply never heard from again.

Additional Information:
- Caused by in-suit temperatures < 10° while not wearing enough warm gear, or staying out in the cold too long.
- Leads to temporary incapacitation when ignored.
- Reduces movement speed and slows down stamina recovering speed.

Treatments: 
Get your suit temperature up! Drink some hot beverages or eat a hot meal. Climbing into bed, standing near a Portable Heater/Cooler (terrain placeable device), or taking a shower can help. It is best to get inside of a powered vehicle or base.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: October 12th 2468[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Indigestion is a common ailment that is easily treated by many methods. Certain folk remedies are still around today from human culture and Andromeda culture. Bloat, stomach pain, flatulence and sluggishness are the usual symptoms.

Other Notes: 
At first I wasn’t going to cover this topic as it seemed such a minor trouble. My mind changed when I attended a holiday party and consumed too much eggnog and buttered yams. I am still my own worst enemy.

Additional Information:
- Caused by continued eating or drinking of contaminated or raw food or (with low probability) using medical items while already affected by [c][ffffff]Food Poisoning[-][/c]!  
- Reduces health.

Treatments: 
Sufferers from indigestion usually find that eating some herbal leaves, a natural sweetener, drinking a hot beverage, some berry or veggie juice, or downing Painkillers helps. Medical stations (type 1) and using the toilet are effective as well.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: December 28th 2072[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
All conditions should never be neglected, but this is especially true for infected wounds. Besides pain, puss, and discoloration, if left alone it can quickly transform into sepsis. This often originates from improperly bandaged injuries or non-treatment. Toxins and pollutants will work their way into your system and fester.

Other Notes: 
Rough and tough types will often rub dirt in their lacerations or forgo wound coverings. Then they get a trip to my clinic and a lecture. Don’t join their ranks.

Additional Information:
- Caused by being injured by a very filthy creature. Not treating open wounds or dermal burns.
- Will start [c][ffffff]Sepsis[-][/c] when not treated.
- Reduces health and also maximum health.

Treatments: 
Get your hands on a detox kit, some antibiotic injections, or some confetti moss scrapings. If those aren’t available, try using antibiotic pills to at least mitigate the immediate effects. Otherwise, a medical station (type 2) will be able to provide aid.



[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: August 3rd 2068[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Intoxication is a serious impairment when in an unfamiliar environment or in your own home station. Not only does it cause your balance to be off, and nausea, but it can lead to organ failure if more intoxicating substances enter the bloodstream or if treatment is disregarded.

Other Notes: 
There is no better day to discuss this ailment than on a New Year's party. Many societies in the galaxy celebrate this event even when being light years away from their home planet.

Additional Information:
- Caused by ignoring or not treating Food Poisoning which is caused by eating insufficiently prepared foods or drinking too much alcohol. 
- When not treated, will result in [c][ffffff]Organ Failure.[-][/c]

Treatments: 
For this condition, some antitoxic pills will suffice to mitigate the immediate effects. Using a medical station (type 1), antitoxic injection or detox kit are the best options to get rid of the Intoxication right away.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: January 1st 2071[/i]

Your stomach rumbles. It’s time for a snack.

Effect: reduces movement speed.
Caused by: Food < 50 pt

Ailment Specifics: 
Mutilations are largely inflicted during combat when limbs are crushed, impaled, or slashed deeply. Sometimes if a broken bone or other condition is mistreated, it can lead to this. If the sufferer survives the injury, and the encounter, these wounds would be permanent in past times. Patients are fortunate that medicine has come so far.

Other Notes: 
These are rare, thankfully so. Even though the body heals, the mind is often severely scared. Nightmares plague most victims and responders who treat them.

Additional Information:
- Caused by severe injuries in combat or maltreatment of necrotic wounds.
- A mutilation will remain until medical aid is provided!
- Reduces stamina recovering speed, movement speed and maximum health.

Treatments: 
Immediately use a first aid kit or get to a medical station (type 3). 

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: May 17th 2070[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
In short, necrosis is the death of cellular tissue to organs, bones, or any flesh really. It is caused by a lack of oxygen or blood to the affected area of the body. Common symptoms are failing stamina, patches of black skin, and pain in the surrounding source. Speaking of which, if you neglect this ailment expect to receive mutilation.

Other Notes: 
There have been reports from my colleagues that some of the space exploring types have hidden wounds from the medical team. Of course this led to the condition taking root in their body, but the motivation behind the injury concealments is still under investigation.

Additional Information:
-  This usually evolves from long standing and untreated conditions, like frostbite as well as from open and closed fractures.
- Reduces stamina recovering speed, health and maximum health.

Treatments: 
First aid kits, antibiotic ointments, and medical stations (type 2) are your best options. Painkillers can help boost the immune system until sufficient medical attention can be utilized.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: June 4th 2472[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
An open fracture is no small incident. They are a leading source of infection and necrosis if not treated. Blood loss, fatigue, swelling, limited mobility, and shock can all accompany an open fracture.

Other Notes: 
Diagnosis of an open fracture is very simple. If the offending broken bone pierces out of the skin, you have one. At the sight of most patient’s own osseous matter, it is expected that some degree of shock will afflict them. Be prepared to treat that along with the main injury.

Additional Information:
- Seeing that most are caused by combat or falls, their presence is immediately felt.
- Creates Open Wound and Closed Fracture when healed.
- Evolves into Necrosis if not treated.
- Reduces stamina recovering speed, movement speed, health and maximum health.

Treatments: 
Medical stations (type 3) are best, or a first aid kit. However, bandages can be used if they are the only tool on hand.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: May 17th 2468[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Yet another wonderful vector for infection. Open wounds are very apparent after surviving an attack. The pain and bleeding make them hard to ignore. Your first priority is to cover the exposed tissue to prevent infection. No, do not rub alien dirt in it. That’s a quick way to introduce undiscovered microorganisms into your body. You wouldn’t want to become that case study.

Other Notes: 
It is best to think of this condition as a step in the process of healing. Often the stabilization of an open fracture, removal of skin parasites, or radiological dermal treatments can cause an open wound. Treat the prior injury, reset your mental state, and then begin handling the open wound. Of course, these can occur independently of any other trauma.

Additional Information:
- Caused by combat injuries or as side effect when treating injuries below the skin (Open Fracture, Dermal Parasite). 
- Also caused by Radiation Sickness (Stage 2).
- Results in an infected wound when not treated.
- Reduces healh.

Treatments: 
For the best results use a stationary medical station (type 2) or a mobile medical station, a first aid kit. In a survival situation bandages are your next best choices followed by raw Opunita Cactus Spears can work as sutures.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: October 12th 2469[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Organ failure is a sign of imminent death. Chances are grim once this sets in. Symptoms include rapid breathing, irregular heartbeat, a low grade fever, high levels of bacteria in the blood, and digestive system shut down. The patient immediately feels sick and their general health quickly declines.

Other Notes: 
Survival rate is decently high in a clinical setting. Even in a hospital, the damage can be long lasting or permanent. When in deep space, the survival rate dramatically drops.

Additional Information:
- Caused by conditions or injuries that are not treated or ignored such as radiation sickness, poisonous bite, or intoxication. 
- Reduces health and movement speed.

Treatments: 
The best options to treat organ failure are a first aid kit or a medical station (type 1). Painkillers can help mitigate the condition, if they are the only thing on hand, but they more than likely won’t save your life.

Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: May 14th 2472

Ailment Specifics:
The symptoms are sluggishness, fatigue, and pain at the injection site. They will worsen as the venom spreads, so time is of the essence when treating. Some cause tissue damage, others target the nervous system, and some even coagulate the blood. Treat venomous bites immediately, they will only worsen! 

Other Notes: 
As stated above, most venoms are from hostile creatures. You’d be surprised just home many technicians and merchants suffer a bite. Alien spiders are very evasive in planetary installations or long distance cargo ships. They hide in machinery rooms or in cargo crates where they can propagate undisturbed.

Additional Information:
- Caused by scratches, pricks, bites, and barbs. As such, most derive from combat with a hostile creature.
- Evolves in an even worst second stage when not treated!
- Reduces movement speed

Treatments: 
While mobile and stationary medical stations (type 1) are always effective, at the first stages there are several options: any of the antitoxic medications, a detox kit, an adrenaline shot, placing raw confetti moss scrapings at the sight, ingesting raw mushrooms, ingesting raw alien spike lemons, and applying raw varon roots. (Note that ingesting raw food might come at a risk).

Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: March 17th 2472

Ailment Specifics: 
This condition only arises from untreated stage 1 envenomation.

Other Notes: 
Severe envenomation is almost never seen. It only happens when someone is isolated from civilization such as exploring an undiscovered planet without proper preparation.

Additional Information:
- Caused by not treating the first stage of Poisonous Bite
- Will have you temporarily stunned as a side effect.
- If further ignored, the venom will continue to cause damage and lead to more injury, then organ failure, which of course will cause expiration.
- Redduces movement speed and stamina recovering speed

Treatments: 
At the second stage these are still effective: antitoxic injections or ointments, adrenaline shots, a detox kit and medical stations (type 1). Antitoxic pills will help to mitigate the immediate effects until a better treatment is available.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: June 4th 2471[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
A radiation burn is your first symptom. Take measures to get away from the radioactive material. Failing to relocate yourself will result in radiation sickness or radiation poisoning. 

Other Notes: 
I am hesitant to write this note as there are still some, especially in the human culture that believe being exposed to radioactive materials will give them superpowers. It will not. Yet, no matter how hard I argue with them in the clinic, a return visit is guaranteed to be soon. Most of the believers end in tragedy.

Additional Information:
- Caused by staying around radioactive sources for prolonged periods of time without proper protective gear (in-suit radiation >1 RAD) 

Treatments: 
Any of the anti-radiation medications will work for a radiation burn. Decontamination kits and medical stations (type 4) are other good choices. Taking a shower can help lower your radiation level.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: April 9th 2471[/i]
Radiation medication has shielded you from harmful radiation and is lowering your radiation dosage.

Ailment Specifics:  
The symptoms of radiation poisoning can occur immediately, or they can come and go. Either way nausea, skin issues, hair loss, fatigue, dizziness, or bleeding can happen. The symptoms vary from patient to patient.

Other Notes: 
At this stage, if a sufferer somehow didn’t notice any burns, the patient is alarmed. They of course should be. Radiation poisoning tends to happen in outbreaks on space stations. A system will lose its radiation shielding and contaminate whole floors of the vessel. Doctors are advised to always have radiation medications on hand in large numbers.

Additional Information:
- Caused by failing to treat a radiation burn or receiving a large dose of radiation (in-suit radiation >3 RAD)
- Reduces movement speed, health and stamina recovering speed

Treatments: 
Use some anti-radiation pills or an injection. Another option is to get to a medical station (type 4) or use a decontamination kit. Taking a shower will lower your radiation levels.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: July 22nd 2068[/i]

Ailment Specifics:
The symptoms of radiation sickness are largely similar to radiation poisoning, but much more intense and persistent. More notable symptoms that draw alarm from patients are bloody stool and blood infused vomit. This panic is warranted of course as organ failure is lurking just around the corner.

Other Notes: 
Few patients with this level of radioactivity are found outside of clinics or hospitals. If you do encounter someone with high levels of radiation, not only should you get them treatment, but isolate them. With high levels in their system, they themselves are a source of radiation.

Additional Information:
- Caused by failing to treat prior radiation issues or receiving a large dose of radiation (in-suit radiation > 5 RAD)
- Evolves into Organ Failure when not treated.
- Reduces movement speed, health and stamina recovering speed

Treatments: 
Radiation injection, a decontamination kit, or reach a medical station (type 4). Taking a shower will help lower your radiation levels.

Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: March 19 2067

Ailment Specifics:  
Again, the symptoms of radiation overload are similar to other radiation poisoning, but even more intense. There are some prominent symptoms however. These include infections and lethal fevers as your body can’t fight off foreign bodies due to the damage. Low blood pressure is common. Organ failure is likely upon the patient. Death is all but assured.

Other Notes: 
Some disturbing accounts of radiation “zombies” are well documented in the medical community. While these aren’t the undead that were popular in the media in prior centuries, they do resemble them. Patients can still be alive while in a state of heavy decay from radiation infections. Only two recorded sufferers have ever recovered. They lived with the scars the rest of their short years.

Additional Information:
- Caused by failing to treat radiation exposures or receiving a lethal amount of radiation (in-suit radiation > 9 RAD)
- Will be accompanied by open wounds
- Reduces movement speed, health and stamina recovering speed

Treatments: 
Your only hope is to utilize a medical station (type 4). Hopping into the shower to lower your radiation levels will only mitigate immediate effects at this point.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: January 30th 2071[/i]

Ailment Specifics:  
Sepsis is not to be taken lightly and does kill. Sepsis happens when the body’s tissues become overly infection laden and the immune system attacks organs. Patients will appear and act extremely sick, as if with the common influenza. Swollen lymph nodes are common and fevers will affect them. Stamina will be poor and health will rapidly decline.

Other Notes: 
Yet another condition caused by people ignoring their body’s help signals. As a doctor, I’m frustrated as to how people will never change no matter how many eras we survive as a species.

Additional Information:
- Caused by not treating infected wounds.
- Reduces stamina recovering speed, health and maximum health.
- Will be accompanied by a fever attack.

Treatments: 
Using a detox kit or activating a medical station (type 2) will clear this up.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: June 3rd 2071[/i]

Ailment Specifics:
Getting stunned will cause a general state of disorientation which in turn causes slow reactions. This, of course, is not lethal on its own. However, if being chased or in a combat situation, one can expect more severe issues to speedily arise.

Other Notes: 
The good old fashioned knock to the head is still highly effective against us human beings. Need I say more?

Additional Information:
- Caused by receiving a vicious strike from a creature, certain untreated conditions (Hypothermia, Freezing) and other afflictions (Poisonous Bite Stage 2, Endo Paraiste Stage 3) can result in becoming stunned.
- Blocks movement speed

Treatments: 
Natural stimulants, energy pills, adrenaline shots, and energy drinks will help shake off being stunned.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter[/i]
[i]Date: August 12th 2071[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Coolness on the skin, goosebumps, and chattering teeth are all good signs of being too cold. This is your early warning before things get worse, such as freezing or hypothermia. Take measures to heat up and prepare with sufficient suit modifications.

Other Notes: 
I suppose you won’t catch a cold from being in cool weather. Still, I’d suggest you bundle up and stay warm even in space.

Additional Information:
- Caused by staying in a cold environment too long without adequate cold gear. (in-suit temperature < 15°C)
- Reduces stamina recovering speed and movement speed.

Treatments: 
Food items can help warm the body, getting inside a powered vessel or base is a good idea, a warm shower is always nice, or remaining near a Portable Heater/Cooler (terrain placeable device). In short, warm up the body.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: February 23rd 2071[/i]

Ailment Specifics: 
Some good indicators that you’re too hot are profuse sweating, cramps, dizziness, and tiredness. Either quickly get out of that situation or have appropriate clothing or gear before stepping into a hot atmosphere.

Other Notes: 
Any explorer should not only survey planets or locations before entering them, but also select gear for them. It is advisable to take a short romp outside of a vessel before wandering too far. That way you’ll know if you’re ready for a longer excursion.

Additional Information:
- Caused by staying in a hot environment for lengthy periods without adequate hot weather clothing. (in-suit temperature > 35°C)
- Reduces stamina recovering speed

Treatments: 
Get near a Portable Heater/Cooler (terrain placeable device), get inside a powered base or vessel, ingest cold food, or take a cold shower. Basically, cool yourself down.

[i]Entry Author: Patty Carter
Date: July 29th 2071[/i]

With a full belly, it seems everything will be alright. Your wounds heal some.

Effects: Slowly regenerates health and food consumption rate.
Caused by: Food Bar > 450pt 
Blocked by Indigestion & Food Poisoning

Vigor surges through your veins! You feel extra robust, antsy, and energetic.

Effects: Increases stamina recovering speed, movement speed and food consumption rate.  
Caused by: apply Adrenaline Shot

A short rest is relieving and your stamina is returning.

Effects: refills stamina
Caused by: sit down or sleep

You’re coming down from a stim boost. Sluggishness has entered your limbs and you crave substance.

Effects: Reduces stamina recovering speed, movement speed and health
Caused by: StimBooster (when expired)

All of your senses light up and it seems you never tire. Strangely, you feel peckish.

When expired: Stim Booster Down
Effects: Increases stamina recovering speed, movement speed and food consumption rate.  
Caused by: Energy Pills

Ailment Specifics:

Everything that could be edible makes you salivate. It’s best to find a big meal before you do something rash.

Effect: Reduces health and movement speed.
Caused by: Food = 0 pt
Anti-venom courses through your body. The effects of poison are diminishing.

When consumed, always triggers:
When consumed, has risk of starting:

Medical as well as normal, edible or consumable items can cause various intended or unintended (side) effects in addition to the primary effect!

To differentiate in the entries:

[c][ffffff]Fully heals[-][/c]
If you consume this item, the mentioned status effect or disease will ALWAYS be healed immediately.

Example: If you use First Aid Kit at Open Fracture this injury disappears. 

Note, however, that when a status effect is HEALED, side effects can also occur! See the respective status effect entry under 'Afflictions'.

[c][ffffff]Mitigates (Protects)[-][/c]
If you consume an item that has a 'Mitigates' effect, it will help you with an illness, but without curing it.

If [c][ffffff]PROTECTS [-][/c]is also set to TRUE, this means that you are protected from the subsequent illness of the respective status effect after using this item!

Example: If you take Antibiotic Pills while you have an Infected Wound, this does not cure the Infected Wound, but allows the wound to 'heal' faster and reduces e.g. the loss of health in the meantime. In addition, taking it also protects you from the secondary disease: when the timer for Infected Wound has expired, there is NO 'sepsis' as would otherwise have been the case!

You can see whether such a 'Mitigate' effect is currently in effect at the bottom left of the screen: The border around the respective status effect turns [c][00ff11]GREEN[-][/c].

[c][ffffff]When consumed, always triggers
When consumed, has risk of starting[-][/c]

Some items can have positive or negative side or additional effects.

Example: An Adrenaline Shot always creates a Stamina Boost that gives you your stamina back faster. However, if you take too many Energy Pills, there is a certain probability that you will slip into a Bad Trip!
Deutsch:
Medizinische sowie normale, essbare oder konsumierbare Gegenstände können neben der Hauptwirkung verschiedene beabsichtigte oder unbeabsichtigte (Neben-)Wirkungen hervorrufen!

 Zur Unterscheidung in den Einträgen:

[c][ffffff]Heilt vollständig[-][/c]
Wenn du diesen Gegenstand konsumierst, wird der genannte Statuseffekt oder die Krankheit IMMER sofort geheilt.

Beispiel: Wenn du den Erste-Hilfe-Kasten bei einem offenen Bruch benutzt, verschwindet diese Verletzung. 

Beachte jedoch, dass bei der HEILUNG eines Statuseffekts auch Nebenwirkungen auftreten können! Siehe den entsprechenden Statuseffekt-Eintrag unter 'Erkrankungen'.

[c][ffffff]Mildert (Schützt)[-][/c]
Wenn du einen Gegenstand konsumierst, der einen 'Mildert'-Effekt hat, hilft er dir bei einer Krankheit, ohne sie jedoch zu heilen. 

Wenn [c][ffffff]SCHÜTZT[-][/c] ebenfalls auf WAHR gesetzt ist, bedeutet das, dass du nach der Einnahme dieses Gegenstands vor der Folgekrankheit des jeweiligen Statuseffekts geschützt bist!

Beispiel: Wenn du Antibiotika-Pillen einnimmst, während du eine infizierte Wunde hast, heilt dies nicht die infizierte Wunde, sondern lässt die Wunde schneller 'heilen' und verringert z.B. den zwischenzeitlichen Gesundheitsverlust. Außerdem schützt dich die Einnahme auch vor der sekundären Krankheit: Wenn der Timer für Infizierte Wunde abgelaufen ist, gibt es KEINE 'Sepsis', wie es sonst der Fall wäre!
\Du kannst unten links auf dem Bildschirm sehen, ob ein solcher 'Abschwächen'-Effekt gerade in Kraft ist: Der Rahmen um den jeweiligen Statuseffekt färbt sich [c][00ff11]GRÜN[-][/c].

[c][ffffff]Wenn konsumiert wird, wird  immer ausgelöst
Wenn konsumiert wird, besteht das Risiko, dass ausgelöst wird[-][/c]

Einige Gegenstände können positive oder negative Neben- oder Zusatzeffekte haben.

Beispiel: Ein Adrenalin-Shot erzeugt immer einen Ausdauerschub, der dir deine Ausdauer schneller zurückgibt. Wenn du jedoch zu viele Energiepillen einnimmst, besteht eine gewisse Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass du in einen schlechten Trip gerätst!

English:
Author: Patty Carter
Date: March 15th 2470
Topic: Introductions

Hello, I am Doctor Patty Carter. These medical notes and journals are entries that I have created for you, the reader. I graduated from Messier University, on the Free Colonist Perseus Station, in 2456 with a doctorate in clinical medicine. From there I joined up as a frontier doctor and that’s where I intend to remain. In that time I’ve seen just about every injury, sickness, and mishap that can occur to the human body. These journals will always be free and published to all human sectors in Andromeda. I hope they save many lives and you never have an emergency to which you must refer to them.

We distinguish between:
- [c][fbff00]Afflictions [-][/c]= diseases, illnesses with mostly negative effects. But some also have interesting positive side effects.
- [c][fbff00]Benefits [-][/c]= things that protect or help you.

The entries explained:

[c][ffffff]Treatments[-][/c]
Items (medical or food!) and devices that heal an affliction completely at once. 

Important: Entries for the above items and devices as well as their use and side effects can be found under 'Medical Items & Devices'!

[c][ffffff]When not cured / When expired[-][/c]
When the timer of an affliction expires, the previous affliction turns into the (usually worse) subsequent affliction.

[c][ffffff]When cured[-][/c]
Some status effects create a subsequent status effect when they are cured. 

Example: You get another status effect Closed Fracture plus Open Wound following the healing of Open Fracture! So sometimes you have to take more precautions. The respective entry of the status effect explains which follow-up effects can occur!

[c][ffffff]Also creates[-][/c]
If the affliction started, it creates the mentioned affliction(s) additionally!

[c][ffffff]Effects[-][/c]
The effect of the affliction on your avatar while the timer is running: Health, Maximum Health, Food, Stamina, Radiation, Temperature etc. 

[c][ffffff]Caused by[-][/c]
The causes that can lead to the mentioned affliction either directly or with a certain chance. 

[c][ffffff]Ailment Specifics[-][/c]
Affliction notes written by me and other medical professionals from Andromeda and the Milky Way.

There are six types of afflictions:

- [c][ff0000]Wound[-][/c]: On the whole, easy to manage. Health-damaging effects that can develop into worse things if not treated.
- [c][ae00ff]Disease[-][/c]: Dangerous conditions that cause the death of the subject.
- [c][fbff00]Infection[-][/c]: Self-sustaining afflictions that wear down the player.
- [c][00ffff]Toxin[-][/c]: Short-lived, mild effects that develop into malignant diseases.
- [c][ffffff]Temperature[-][/c]: The usual heat and cold effects. As the body temperature becomes more extreme, these effects also increase.
- [c][ffffff]Radiation[-][/c]: The usual radiation effects. When radiation increases, these effects occur.

The four main types are divided into these categories:

{AfflictionsOverview.jpg}

Which afflictions produce which effects and how they can be cured or mitigated is listed in the entries for Afflictions, Benefits, Medical Items & Medical Devices!
Deutsch:
Es gibt sechs Arten von Erkrankung: [c][ff0000]Wunde[-][/c]: Im Großen und Ganzen leicht zu bewältigende, gesundheitsschädigende Auswirkungen, die sich zu schlimmeren Dingen entwickeln können, wenn sie nicht behandelt werden.
- [c][ae00ff]Krankheit[-][/c]: Gefährliche Zustände, die den Tod des Subjekts verursachen.
- [c][fbff00]Infektion[-][/c]: Selbsterhaltende Krankheiten, die den Spieler zermürben.
- [c][00ffff]Toxin[-][/c]: Kurzlebige, leichte Effekte, die sich zu bösartigen Krankheiten entwickeln.
- [c][ffffff]Temperatur[-][/c]: Die üblichen Hitze- und Kälteeffekte. Wenn die Körpertemperatur extremer wird, nehmen auch diese Auswirkungen zu. 
- [c][ffffff]Strahlung[-][/c]: Die üblichen Strahlungseffekte. Wenn die Strahlung zunimmt, treten diese Effekte auf.

Die vier Haupttypen sind in diese Kategorien unterteilt:

{AfflictionsOverview.jpg}

Welche Beschwerden welche Effekte hervorrufen und wie sie geheilt oder gemildert werden können, findest du in den Einträgen für Erkrankungen, Boni, medizinische Gegenstände und medizinische Geräte!
